patch 8.2.2137: Vim9: :echo and :execute give error for empty argument

Problem:    Vim9: :echo and :execute give error for empty argument.
Solution:   Ignore an empty argument. (closes #7468)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: :echo and :execute give error for empty argument. Solution: Ignore an empty argument. (closes #7468)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c530852315517a44354edbbd6c3375355bbec37e|patch 8.2.2136: Vim9: Using uninitialized variable>
patch 8.2.2136: Vim9: Using uninitialized variable

Problem:    Vim9: Using uninitialized variable.
Solution:   Initialize "len" to zero.  Clean up fnamemodify().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2136: Vim9: Using uninitialized variable · vim/vim@c530852
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2136: Vim9: Using uninitialized variable · vim/vim@c530852
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: Using uninitialized variable. Solution: Initialize "len" to zero. Clean up fnamemodify().

patch 8.2.2135: Vim9: #{ still seen as start of dict in some places

Problem:    Vim9: #{ still seen as start of dict in some places.
Solution:   Remove check for { after #. (closes #7456)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: #{ still seen as start of dict in some places. Solution: Remove check for { after #. (closes #7456)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/57f799e6a4a56f41570c752c66dc2f692b1f2c2f|patch 8.2.2134: Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin fun…>
patch 8.2.2134: Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin function

Problem:    Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin function.
Solution:   Check that did_emsg increased instead of checking that it changed.
            (closes #7448)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2134: Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin fun… · vim/vim@57f799e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2134: Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin fun… · vim/vim@57f799e
attachments.text: …ction Problem: Vim9: get E1099 when autocmd triggered in builtin function. Solution: Check that did_emsg increased instead of checking that it changed. (closes #7448)

patch 8.2.2133: Vim9: checking for a non-empty string is too strict

Problem:    Vim9: checking for a non-empty string is too strict.
Solution:   Check for any string. (closes #7447)

patch 8.2.2132: padding not drawn properly for popup window with title

Problem:    Padding not drawn properly for popup window with title.
Solution:   Draw the padding below the title. (closes #7460)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2132: padding not drawn properly for popup window with title · vim/vim@3ae50c7
attachments.text: Problem: Padding not drawn properly for popup window with title. Solution: Draw the padding below the title. (closes #7460)
